title: Binary Tree Postorder Traversal

Postorder traversal follows the order: Left → Right → Root.
constraints: The number of nodes in the tree is in the range [0, 100].

def build_tree(data):
    if data == "[]":
        return None
    data = data[1:-1].split(',')
    root = TreeNode(int(data[0].strip()))
    queue = deque([root])
    i = 1

    while queue and i < len(data):
        node = queue.popleft()
        if data[i].strip() != "null":
            node.left = TreeNode(int(data[i].strip()))
            queue.append(node.left)
        i += 1
        if i < len(data) and data[i].strip() != "null":
            node.right = TreeNode(int(data[i].strip()))
            queue.append(node.right)
        i += 1
    return root
